main event: Several residents in the Silver Lake district of Hollywood observed a UFO for about 15 to 20 minutes on 10 August 1965.
interesting points: The UFO was reported to be about the size of a football,The blue object accompanying the UFO was about the size of a baseball,The UFO maneuvered and then suddenly disappeared, The sighting occurred during cooler temperatures with light precipitation,The case was considered closed by the USAF with no further action necessary.
witness description: residents in the Silver Lake district
